question: What is the theme of the ‘NIC TechConclave 2020’, organized by the National Informatics Centre (NIC)?
explanation:
The Union Minister for Electronics & Information Technology, Ravi Shankar Prasad is to inaugurate the second edition of ‘NIC TechConclave 2020’ in New Delhi. It is a two-day event being organized by the National Informatics Centre (NIC).
The theme of this edition of the event is ‘Technologies for NextGen Governance’. Several experts from the fields of Cyber Security, Hyperscale Architecture, Design Thinking are to participate in the conclave and share their knowledge. This Conclave will enhance the capacity building of Government officers across the country and will help in delivering better citizen-centric services.
